price: Manusia bertanya kepadamu tentang hari berbangkit.  Katakanlah, "Sesungguhnya pengetahuan tentang hari berbangkit itu hanya di sisi Allah".  Dan tahukah kamu (hai Muhammad), boleh jadi hari berbangkit itu sudah dekat waktunya.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yasaluka al-nāsu ʿani al-sāʿati qul innamā ʿil'muhā ʿinda al-lahi wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata takūnu qarīban
